title: Did Beck Hunter Payden use Malia Obama's credit card for Snort Cocaine?
subtitle: The picture's not new. The card probably doesn't belong to Malia Obama, and there's no evidence linking it to Hunter Biden.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A new picture of Malia Obama ' s credit card was found on Hunter Paiden ' s laptop along with cocaine lines on the device that Paiden was smudging.
